name: moomoo-milk
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 100 HP.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A nutritious milk that restores HP by 100 points.
flavor_text.emerald: A nutritious milk that restores HP by 100 points.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Highly nutritious milk. It restores the HP of one POKéMON by 100 points.
